name: Brainwave
description:
Brainwave is a fighting game that places up to 8 players against each other locally, using only a single key each to control the character. You can use your keyboard, (A-Z, 0-1), Mouse or Joystick.

1 - Press your assigned key once to to jump.

2 - Press it a second time to double jump and switch direction.

3 - Press it a third time to stomp and release a burst of waves.

Toss opponent out the arena or step on their head and survive until the end to win. 3 lives by default.

This was a Global Game Jam 2017 entry and we intend to develop a more polished and commercial version of it.

If you liked it, please support!

*Note: Some keyboards might have a restriction on the maximum amount of keys pressed at the same time. But you still can use mouse or joystick buttons.
